TopicTitle: Certain ships not loading correctly in the VAB

Articles.Content:
When I load a few of my spacecrafts in the VAB the Staging isn't loading in correctly. On one of my ships specifically, the parts menu seems to not properly show as well. I've tried verifying game cache on steam as well as a reinstall but to no avail. 

[Here is what the VAB screen looks like on the most broken ship.](http://gyazo.com/23ef6eb9d2cb5061fdaaeeddd12ff6d4)

The launch button seems to freeze the game and the exit button doesn't work. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Edit: The ship in the picture turned out to have become corrupted. Deleting the ship seems to have fixed the problem for the other ships as well.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-28T22:17:00Z" title="03/28/2015 10:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 28, 2015</time> by HaloMan27**

As it would turn out, the file for that ship seems to have become corrupted. Deleting that ship seems to have made the problem go away! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
